name: Video Streaming Websockets With Glassfish
body:
# Websocket Video Streaming Example
## For potential use with EricBot
### Using NetBeans and GlassFish

Implementation of  exact tutorials within these two articles:
http://javawebsocketsvideo.blogspot.com/


https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Navigator.getUserMedia

Requires javax.websocket

## Remote Client Sending Video:
[https://github.com/n644dc/1WayVideo_WebSockets/blob/master/web/index.html](https://github.com/n644dc/1WayVideo_WebSockets/blob/master/web/index.html)

## Server Relay
[https://github.com/n644dc/1WayVideo_WebSockets/blob/master/src/java/EricBotVideo/LiveStreamer.java](https://github.com/n644dc/1WayVideo_WebSockets/blob/master/src/java/EricBotVideo/LiveStreamer.java)

## Remote Client Receiving Video:
[https://github.com/n644dc/1WayVideo_WebSockets/blob/master/web/Bot.html](https://github.com/n644dc/1WayVideo_WebSockets/blob/master/web/Bot.html)



![werwer](http://images.nationalgeographic.com/wpf/media-live/photos/000/007/cache/wild-turkey_765_600x450.jpg)
